<h1 id="new-hire-onboarding">new-hire-onboarding</h1> <blockquote> <p>The best project ever..</p> </blockquote> <h2 id="-assemble-http-assemble-io-"><a href="http://assemble.io/">Assemble</a></h2> <p>Assemble is a component and static site generator that makes it dead simple to build modular sites, documentation and components from reusable templates and data.</p> <ul> <li>Documentation</li> <li>Plugins - Plugins extend the core functionality of Assemble.</li> <li>Helpers - Documentation for the helpers in the <a href="http://github.com/assemble/handlebars-helpers">handlebars-helpers</a> library.</li> </ul> <h2 id="contributing">Contributing</h2> <p>All contributions are welcome! The simplest way to show your support for this project is to <strong>&quot;star&quot; it</strong>. Please see <a href="http://assemble.io/contributing">Contributing to Assemble</a> for more information.</p> <h2 id="release-history">Release History</h2> <ul> <li>2015-05-06   v0.1.0   Generated by the <a href="https://github.com/assemble/generator-assemble">Yeoman Generator</a> for <a href="http://assemble.io">Assemble</a><h1 id="new-hire-onboarding">new-hire-onboarding</h1> </li> </ul>
